item.title: ABB扩大在华机器人产品阵容，发力中型客户
item.description: 瑞士工程公司 ABB 周三表示，该公司将推出专为中国设计的三个新系列的工厂机器人，以满足中型企业对自动化不断增长的需求。【原文：ABB is launching three new families of factory robots designed specially for China, the Swiss engineering company said on Wednesday, as it aims to benefit from rising demand for automation among mid-sized companies.】

item.title: KKR 同意以 65 亿美元收购思百吉，高于 Advent 的出价
item.description: 英国思百吉公司周三表示，已接受美国私募股权公司 KKR 提出的更高收购要约，包括债务在内，这家科学仪器制造商的估值约为 47 亿英镑（64.6 亿美元）。【原文：Britain's Spectris has accepted an improved takeover offer from U.S. private equity firm KKR , valuing the scientific instruments maker at about 4.7 billion pounds ($6.46 billion), including debt, the companies said on Wednesday.】

item.title: 中国共产党杂志呼吁打击价格战
item.description: 一份著名的中国共产党出版物呼吁打击助长价格战和挤压各行业利润的竞争形式，批评大公司和地方政府的不公平做法。【原文：A prominent Chinese Communist Party publication called for a crackdown on forms of competition that fuel price wars and squeeze profits in various industries, criticising big firms and local governments for unfair practices.】

item.title: 法国和瑞士商业软件公司的合并预示着新独角兽的诞生
item.description: 法国商业软件供应商 LumApps 和瑞士同业公司 Beekeeper 表示，两家公司的合并将创造一个价值约 11 亿美元的新独角兽企业。【原文：A merger between French business software provider LumApps and its Swiss peer Beekeeper will create a new unicorn worth about $1.1 billion, the two companies said.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场静待贸易进展
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 据《洛杉矶时报》报道，派拉蒙公司与特朗普就《60 分钟》采访达成和解
item.description: 据《洛杉矶时报》报道，哥伦比亚广播公司（CBS）的母公司派拉蒙公司周三就美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）就该公司 10 月份在 "60 分钟 "新闻节目中播出的一次采访提起的诉讼达成和解。【原文：CBS parent company Paramount settled a lawsuit on Wednesday filed by U.S. President Donald Trump over an interview that aired on its “60 Minutes” news program in October, LA Times reported.】

item.title: 阿里云宣布在马来西亚和菲律宾新建数据中心
item.description: 中国科技巨头阿里巴巴集团旗下的云计算部门阿里云周三发表声明称，该公司周二宣布在马来西亚开设第三个数据中心，并透露计划于10月在菲律宾开设第二个数据中心。【原文：Alibaba Cloud, the cloud computing arm of Chinese tech giant Alibaba Group, announced the opening of its third data center in Malaysia on Tuesday and disclosed plans to launch a second data center in the Philippines in October, according to a statement released on Wednesday.】

item.title: 必和必拓与中远签订合成氨双燃料船租赁合同
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业巨头必和必拓集团（BHP Group）周三表示，已与中国远洋运输集团（COSCO Shipping）签订了两艘氨气双燃料纽卡斯尔型（Newcastlemax）散货船的租船合同。【原文：Australia's BHP Group has signed contracts with China's COSCO Shipping for the charter of two ammonia dual-fuelled Newcastlemax bulk carriers, the mining giant said on Wednesday.】

item.title: KKR 将从 Aware Super 收购澳大利亚鸡肉种植商 ProTen
item.description: 私募股权集团 KKR 将从养老基金 Aware Super 手中收购澳大利亚最大的肉鸡种植企业之一 ProTen，双方在周三的一份联合声明中表示，但未披露财务细节。【原文：Private equity group KKR will acquire ProTen, one of Australia's largest broiler chicken growers, from pension fund Aware Super, the parties said in a joint statement on Wednesday without disclosing financial details.】

item.title: 特朗普关税和美国加息路径影响亚洲股市和美元走势
item.description: 周三，亚洲股市下滑，美元在3年半低点附近徘徊，投资者权衡了美国降息的前景，以及在唐纳德-特朗普总统7月9日关税最后期限到来之前对贸易协议的争夺。【原文：Asian stocks slipped on Wednesday and the dollar languished near 3-1/2-year lows as investors weighed the prospect of U.S. interest rate cuts and the scramble for trade deals ahead of President Donald Trump's July 9 deadline for tariffs.】

item.title: 备忘录显示，高盛任命拉格夫-马里亚为投资银行部全球董事长
item.description: 根据高盛周三发布的一份备忘录，高盛已任命拉格夫-马里亚（Raghav Maliah）为投资银行部主席，他将在担任现有地区职务的同时，兼任全球职务。【原文：Goldman Sachs has appointed Raghav Maliah as a chairman of investment banking, a global position that he will take on alongside his existing regional responsibilities, according to a memo issued by the bank on Wednesday.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 5 月零售额仅小幅增长，为下周降息提供支持
item.description: 由于服装购买量的增长被食品销售量罕见的下降所抵消，澳大利亚 5 月份的零售额连续第四个月勉强增长，这为下周再次降息提供了支持。【原文：Australian retail sales barely grew for a fourth straight month in May as gains in clothing purchases were offset by a rare drop in food sales, bolstering the case for another cut in interest rates next week.】

item.title: 投资者期待欧佩克+会议，油价变化不大
item.description: 周三，石油期货价格变化不大，因为在本周主要产油国召开会议确定 8 月份的产量水平之前，投资者对此持谨慎态度。【原文：Oil futures were little changed on Wednesday as investors are wary ahead of a meeting of major producers this week to determine output levels for August.】

item.title: 独家：英特尔新任首席执行官探索芯片制造业务的重大转变
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士告诉路透社记者，英特尔新任首席执行官正在探索对其合同制造业务进行重大改革，以赢得主要客户，这可能是其前任计划的一个代价高昂的转变。【原文：Intel's new chief executive is exploring a big change to its contract manufacturing business to win major customers, two people familiar with the matter told Reuters, in a potentially expensive shift from his predecessor's plans.】

item.title: 德尔蒙特食品公司启动美国破产程序寻求买家
item.description: 德尔蒙特食品公司在一份声明中说，该公司根据与某些主要贷款人达成的协议，于周二在美国申请破产保护程序，从而启动了寻求出售的努力。【原文：Del Monte Foods kicked off efforts to pursue a sale as it filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy proceedings in the United States on Tuesday under an agreement with certain key lenders, the company said in a statement.】

item.title: 美联储减息、特朗普法案成焦点，美元徘徊在 3-1/2 年低点附近
item.description: 周三，由于交易商考虑到美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）的鸽派暗示，以及唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统的支出法案的潜在影响，美元兑主要同业汇率徘徊在2022年2月以来的最低点附近。【原文：The U.S. dollar hunkered near the lowest since February 2022 against major peers on Wednesday, as traders considered dovish hints from Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, along with the potential impact of President Donald Trump's spending bill.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，软银的 Ampere 交易将面临美国联邦贸易委员会的深入审查
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周二报道，美国联邦贸易委员会已对软银集团收购半导体设计公司 Ampere Computing LLC 的交易展开深入调查。【原文：The U.S. Federal Trade Commission has launched an in-depth investigation into SoftBank Group Corp's purchase of semiconductor designer Ampere Computing LLC, Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国财政部长称他认为美联储可能在 9 月前降息
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，他相信美联储可能会在 9 月份之前降低利率。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said on Tuesday he believes the Federal Reserve could lower interest rates by September.】

item.title: 澳大利亚航空公司确认联络中心发生网络事件，客户数据被曝光
item.description: 澳大利亚澳洲航空公司（Qantas Airways）证实，周三该公司的一个联络中心发生了网络事件，客户数据受到影响。【原文：Australia's Qantas Airways confirmed the occurrence of a cyber incident at one of its contact centres on Wednesday, impacting customer data.】

item.title: 南方共同市场和欧洲自由贸易联盟集团签署自由贸易协定，CNN Brasil 报道
item.description: 据 CNN Brasil 周二援引巴西政府官员的话报道，南美集团南方共同市场已经结束了与由四个欧洲国家组成的欧洲自由贸易联盟（EFTA）的自由贸易协定谈判。【原文：South American bloc Mercosur has concluded talks for a free-trade agreement with a group of four European nations known as EFTA, CNN Brasil reported on Tuesday, citing officials from the Brazilian government.】

item.title: 尽管特朗普做出了努力，但美国联邦政府的员工队伍仍保持稳定
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统的政府周二报告称，3月份联邦工资单上有230万人，几乎与前几个月持平，尽管共和党人努力缩小政府规模。【原文：President Donald Trump's administration on Tuesday reported having 2.3 million people on federal payrolls in March, almost unchanged from prior months despite the Republican's efforts to shrink the size of government.】

item.title: 美国参议院预算法案削减填补石油储备的资金
item.description: 美国参议院周二通过的预算法案削减了补充战略石油储备的资金，尽管唐纳德-特朗普总统在其第二个任期的第一天就发誓要 "不惜一切代价 "补充战略石油储备。【原文：The budget bill passed by the U.S. Senate on Tuesday slashes the amount of money available to replenish the Strategic Petroleum Reserve even though President Donald Trump vowed on his first day in his second term to fill it "right to the top".】

item.title: 杰夫-贝索斯 6 月份出售了价值约 7.37 亿美元的亚马逊股票
item.description: 根据周二提交的一份监管文件，亚马逊创始人兼执行主席杰夫-贝索斯在 6 月底出售了该电子商务巨头价值近 7.37 亿美元的股票。【原文：Amazon founder and executive chair Jeff Bezos sold shares worth almost $737 million in the e-commerce giant in late June, according to a regulatory filing on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国消费者监督机构撤销与海军联邦信用合作社达成的 9500 万美元 "非法收费 "和解协议
item.description: 根据周三公布的一项命令，美国最高消费者金融监督机构本周取消了去年与海军联邦信用联盟达成的 9500 万美元的和解协议。【原文：The top U.S. watchdog agency for consumer finance this week canceled a $95 million settlement reached last year with Navy Federal Credit Union, a lender officials in the prior administration had accused of illegally charging surprise overdraft fees, according to an order published Wednesday.】

item.title: 美国最大银行通过压力测试后上调股息并宣布股票回购
item.description: 美国银行业巨头在上周通过美联储的年度体检后，于周二宣布了提高第三季度股息的计划。【原文：U.S. banking giants announced plans on Tuesday to raise their third-quarter dividends after clearing the Federal Reserve's annual health check last week.】

item.title: 谷歌在美国蜂窝数据集体诉讼案中被判赔 3.14 亿美元
item.description: 据原告律师称，加州圣何塞的一个陪审团周二表示，谷歌滥用了客户的手机数据，必须向该州的安卓智能手机用户支付超过 3.146 亿美元的赔偿金。【原文：A jury in San Jose, California, said on Tuesday that Google misused customers' cell phone data and must pay more than $314.6 million to Android smartphone users in the state, according to an attorney for the plaintiffs.】

item.title: 科罗娜啤酒制造商星座品牌公司因关税问题未达季度预期
item.description: 由于担心关税上涨和经济不确定性，消费者减少了啤酒和葡萄酒的购买，星座品牌公司（Constellation Brands）周二公布的第一季度销售额和利润不及预期。【原文：Constellation Brands missed first-quarter sales and profit estimates on Tuesday, as fears of rising tariffs and economic uncertainty prompted consumers to reduce purchases of beers and wines.】

item.title: 交易日：美国大范围财政法案取得进展，加息路径仍不明朗
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 法拉利在推出电动汽车之前推出新款 "Amalfi "汽油轿跑车
item.description: 法拉利周二发布了新款阿马尔菲双门跑车，这家豪华跑车制造商在其产品系列中混合了汽油和混合动力车型，同时准备推出其首款全电动汽车。【原文：Ferrari revealed its new Amalfi coupe on Tuesday as the luxury sportscar maker mixes petrol and hybrid models in its range while preparing for the launch of its first fully electric vehicle.】

item.title: 特朗普称接替美联储主席鲍威尔有 "两三个 "人选
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周二表示，他有两三个接替杰罗姆-鲍威尔担任美联储主席的最佳人选。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Tuesday he has two or three top choices to replace Jerome Powell as Federal Reserve chair.】
